content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: J'accepte cette contribution car ce clash of code est sympa et facilement réalisable en moins de cinq minutes. Il ressemble à d'autres mais n'ai jamais rencontré le dessin en forme de diamant.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I accept this contribution because leck eier

Goal
* Please change "all of the dough" to "as much of the dough as possible".

* Please change ". After cutting the diamond out, you need to" to "and".

* Please change "square of dough" to "original dough".

* Please add "The leftover dough is represented by {{*}} characters, and the hole is represented by spaces. Note that [[n]] must be odd to accommodate the diamond cut."

Input
* Please change "squared" to "square".

* Please change "Cookie Dough" to "cookie dough".

Output
* Please rewrite as follows:

If [[n]] is odd:
<<[[n]] lines>>: The remaining cookie dough.

If [[n]] is even:
<<Line 1>>: {{no cookie :(}}

Thanks.

The statement: "while trying to use all of the dough" it make me thought it was a about a maximum resource problem. i thought a diagonal shape diamond could fit better the solution of the description of the statement problem..... but with the "test cases" i notice it was an ASCII shape puzzle with a vertical diamond shape...... maybe change part of the statement "to cut a vertical diamond-shaped cookie"?....but anyways, with the test cases looks good :)

Thank you so much for your feedback, 
i changed the statements, English is not my first language...
thank you though.
